definition[0]: someone who has formally asked, usually in writing, for a job, university place etc
example[0]: Successful applicants will be expected to travel extensively.

definition[1]: a person who applies for a job or a place at a university, or for official permission to do something
example[2]: The starting salary of the successful applicant will be fixed according to experience.
definition[2]: a person or organization who asks to buy new shares when they are first made available
example[4]: A share applicant can withdraw his application at any time before allotment is made.
